com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts

Class ValueAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts.ChartAxis
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts.ValueAxis

  • public final class ValueAxis
extends ChartAxis
    Represents an axis used for series values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AxisType getAxisType()
      Gets the axis type for ValueAxis which is AxisType.VALUE.
      Optional<Double> getMajorUnit()
      Gets the distance between major ticks or Optional.empty() if value should be automatically calculated based on chart's data.
